intro: Stachytarpheta sobraliana, commonly known as the Brazilian ironweed, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. Its small, tubular flowers are usually clustered in dense inflorescences, and it is often cultivated for its ornamental value. Stachytarpheta sobraliana is also valued in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
